apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the Upwork Jobs API

apiEndpoint.title: API Endpoint
apiEndpoint.description: Base URL for the Upwork Jobs API

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to fetch and process (1-50)

includeRawData.title: Include Raw API Payload
includeRawData.description: Attach the full response payload for each job in the dataset output

filters.title: Job Filters
filters.description: Optional filters forwarded to the jobs API

paymentVerified.title: Payment Verified Only
paymentVerified.description: Return only clients with a verified payment method

category.title: Category Slug
category.description: Filter by Upwork specialty category slug (e.g. web-mobile-software-dev)

categoryGroup.title: Category Group Slug
categoryGroup.description: Filter by Upwork category group slug (e.g. dev-it)

country.title: Client Country
country.description: Two-letter ISO country code (e.g. US, GB)

tags.title: Required Tags
tags.description: List of tags that must be present on the job

postedAfter.title: Posted After
postedAfter.description: Only include jobs posted after this ISO 8601 timestamp (e.g. 2024-04-01T00:00:00Z)

postedBefore.title: Posted Before
postedBefore.description: Only include jobs posted before this ISO 8601 timestamp

budgetMin.title: Minimum Fixed Budget
budgetMin.description: Filter jobs with a fixed budget greater than or equal to this amount

budgetMax.title: Maximum Fixed Budget
budgetMax.description: Filter jobs with a fixed budget less than or equal to this amount

sort.title: Sort Order
sort.description: Sort results by posted date or last visited timestamp
